title: Egg salad with asparagus vinaigrette
ingredients: ['3 eggs', '900g fresh asparagus, trimmed', '120ml white wine vinegar', '2 teaspoons Dijon mustard', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/8 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '35g green pepper, chopped', '3 tablespoons pickle relish', '1 tablespoon fresh parsley, chopped', '1 tablespoon fresh chives, chopped', '240ml olive oil', '450g mixed baby salad leaves', '4 radishes, sliced', '2 tomatoes, quartered']
